properties.name: blackbox-it.log.http-server.password
properties.description: The password used to authenticate against the test result server

properties.name: blackbox-it.log.http-server.username
properties.description: The username used to authenticate against the test result server

properties.name: blackbox-it.log.http-server.url
properties.description: The URL of the server to POST the results to

properties.name: blackbox-it.tags.default
properties.description: The default tag(s) to apply to tests. Can be used to tag the origin, like application or module name
